name: The Lonely Robot - Game Design Final Project
name_original: The Lonely Robot - Game Design Final Project
description:
An interactive story about a robot trying to collect batteries in an increasingly darkening world. The game takes on themes of loneliness, isolation, and things being right out of reach in a short amount of time. 

* Explore

* Wall-jump

* Find your way out

The game takes place in an ambiguous industrial area, with textures to match. The levels are simplistic yet deceptive. Players must platform, explore, and use trial and error to work their way out of this pit.

All artwork and music by Austin Blankenship
